langsim.datatypes.raw_lines module¶

class RawTextLinesDocumentType(options, metadata)[source]¶

Bases: pimlico.datatypes.documents.TextDocumentType

Like a raw-text document, but the data is assumed to have been split up in some way into subtexts, each consisting of a line. The subtexts may not include line breaks.

formatters = [('textlines', 'langsim.datatypes.raw_lines.RawTextLinesFormatter')]¶
